SkillInfo.En: Perform a continuous attack with your sword.
SkillInfo.Jp: Perform a continuous attack with your sword.

SkillCommand.En:
After pressing <KC ATTACK1>, delay a moment and press
<KC ATTACK1> repeatedly.
SkillCommand.Jp:
After pressing <KC ATTACK1>, delay a moment and press
<KC ATTACK1> repeatedly.

SkillInfo.En:
Pausing after your first swing allows you to follow
up with a powerful concentrated attack.
SkillInfo.Jp:
Pausing after your first swing allows you to follow
up with a powerful concentrated attack.

SkillCommand.En: After holding <KC ATTACK2> for a little while, release it.
SkillCommand.Jp: After holding <KC ATTACK2> for a little while, release it.

SkillInfo.En:
Perform a strong overhead swing, holding down longer 
for increased power that's capable of breaking an enemies 
guard. It is also possible to topple the enemy.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP Increase attack power
Evolve into "Strong Guard Break" allowing you to guard
break without max power.</COL>
SkillInfo.Jp:
Perform a strong overhead swing, holding down longer 
for increased power that's capable of breaking an enemies 
guard. It is also possible to topple the enemy.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP Increase attack power
Evolve into "Strong Guard Break" allowing you to guard
break without max power.</COL>

SkillCommand.En: After holding <KC ATTACK2> for a little while, release it.
SkillCommand.Jp: After holding <KC ATTACK2> for a little while, release it.

SkillInfo.En:
Perform a stronger overhead swing capable of breaking
and enemies guard, holding down longer for increased power. 
A longer hold has a better chance to topple.
SkillInfo.Jp:
Perform a stronger overhead swing capable of breaking
and enemies guard, holding down longer for increased power. 
A longer hold has a better chance to topple.

SkillCommand.En: Press <KC ATTACK1> while in the air.
SkillCommand.Jp: Press <KC ATTACK1> while in the air.

SkillInfo.En: Swing your sword while in the air.
SkillInfo.Jp: Swing your sword while in the air.

SkillCommand.En: Press <KC ATTACK2> while in the air.
SkillCommand.Jp: Press <KC ATTACK2> while in the air.

SkillInfo.En:
Slash downwards while airborne, falling down onto the
enemy. Increased power at an increased height.
SkillInfo.Jp:
Slash downwards while airborne, falling down onto the
enemy. Increased power at an increased height.

SkillInfo.En:
Hold your shield strong to block enemy attacks.
Can also be activated while in the air.
SkillInfo.Jp:
Hold your shield strong to block enemy attacks.
Can also be activated while in the air.

SkillCommand.En: Press <KC WEAPON_SUB> just as an enemy attacks.
SkillCommand.Jp: Press <KC WEAPON_SUB> just as an enemy attacks.

SkillInfo.En:
Timing your block just as the enemy attacks you,
will deflect their attack.
Can also be activated while in the air.
SkillInfo.Jp:
Timing your block just as the enemy attacks you,
will deflect their attack.
Can also be activated while in the air.

SkillInfo.En:
Posed in a crouched position, toss a close companion
into the air.
SkillInfo.Jp:
Posed in a crouched position, toss a close companion
into the air.

SkillCommand.En: While being knocked away, press <KC JUMP>
SkillCommand.Jp: While being knocked away, press <KC JUMP>

SkillInfo.En: Recover quickly from being knocked down by an enemy.
SkillInfo.Jp: Recover quickly from being knocked down by an enemy.

SkillCommand.En: While climbing an enemy, press <KC ATTACK1>
SkillCommand.Jp: While climbing an enemy, press <KC ATTACK1>

SkillInfo.En:
While clinging onto an enemy, thrust your sword into
them. Continuous press increases attack count.
SkillInfo.Jp:
While clinging onto an enemy, thrust your sword into
them. Continuous press increases attack count.
